---
id: get-user-entitlements
title: "Query User Entitlements"
description: "Search for the entitlements a user has purchased externally where a mapped SKU exists on the game."
sidebar_label: "Query User Entitlements"
hide_title: true

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Query User Entitlements"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/me/entitlements"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Search for the entitlements a user has purchased externally where a mapped SKU exists on the game.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"X-Modio-Portal","in":"header","description":"The portal the request is targeting. Valid values include: `steam`, `psn`, `xboxlive` and `epicgames`. The given portal will determine which properties are required in the request body.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"steam"},{"name":"X-Modio-Platform","in":"header","description":"[The specific platform to target.](/restapi/platforms#targeting-a-platform) Required when portal is set to `psn`.","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"properties":{"game_id":{"description":"Unique id of the game to check entitlements against. _*Not required when g-url is used._","type":"integer","example":1010},"psn_token":{"description":"The auth code returned from the PlayStation™Network API.","type":"string","example":"v3.AbCdE"},"psn_env":{"description":"The PlayStation™Network environment you are targeting. If omitted, the request will default to targeting the production environment.","type":"integer","example":256},"psn_service_label":{"description":"The service label where the entitlements for mod.io reside. If omitted the default value will be 0.","type":"integer","example":0},"xbox_token":{"description":"The Xbox Live token returned from calling [GetTokenAndSignatureAsync(\"\"POST\"\", \"\"https://api.mod.io\"\")](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/microsoft.xbox.services.system.xboxliveuser.gettokenandsignatureasync?view=xboxlive-dotnet-2017.11.20171204.01). <br /><br />__NOTE:__ Due to the encrypted app ticket containing special characters, you must URL encode the string before sending the request to ensure it is successfully sent to our servers otherwise you may encounter an `422 Unprocessable Entity` response. For example, [cURL](https://ec.haxx.se/http-post.html) will do this for you by using the `--data-urlencode` option.","type":"string","example":"XBL3.0 x=9264027439329321064;eym72VygeZzTSUVRmNvw8v..."},"epicgames_token":{"description":"The bearer token which can act on behalf of the user. Refer to [\"requesting an access token\"](https://dev.epicgames.com/docs/web-api-ref/authentication#requesting-an-access-token) in the Epic Games documentation.","type":"string","example":"eyJraWQiOiJWbWdpMDFoQ..."},"epicgames_sandbox_id":{"description":"The environment to target. Refer to [\"what is a sandbox?\"](https://dev.epicgames.com/docs/dev-portal/product-management#what-is-a-sandbox) in the Epic Games documentation.","type":"string","example":"p-k3t9v0mdqzgsx4hpl8w2nfc5ry7bj4"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
